=== Current Issues ===

Ubuntu Hardy 8.04 - i386:
* Integrated Wireless needs ndiswrapper to work, after that it works fine.

Ubuntu Gutsy - i386:
* Sound doesn't work by default, but does work with an update to ALSA 1.0.15
* Integrated Wireless works without encryption, but hard freezes when connecting to an encrypted network.  Also, signal strength does not work.

Ubuntu Feisty - i386:
* Sound doesn't work.
* Integrated Wireless Dosn't "Just Work" by default.

Ubuntu Feisty-AMD64:
* Screen Resolution set at 1024x768, cannot adjust higher from "Screen Resolution" application. Also, no refresh rate listed in that application.
* Sound Doesn't Work
* Ethernet doesn't "Just Work" by Default
* * Must be selected from "Networking" application, after which it works completely
* Integrated Wirless doesn't "Just Work" by Default
* * Must be selected from "Networking" application, after which it works, but does not show correct signal strength
* CD/DVD Burning Doesn't Work (Mounting/Opening Other CD's works completely)
* * Blank CD's are mounted and recognized as Blank for roughly 1 second, before no longer being recognized, system thinks drive is empty.
